item.title: Flume快速上手
item.author: 作者
item.description: 本文旨在提供一个快速上手Flume的教程，内容上麻雀虽小但五脏俱全. 什么是Flume Flume is a distributed, reliable, and available service for efficiently collecting, aggregating, and moving large amounts of log data. Flume 是一种分布式、可
